pricing.question: What's included in the membership?
pricing.answer: Our standard membership includes access to all classes on our schedule. Train as much as you want!

pricing.question: How do I claim my free trial class?
pricing.answer: Simply contact us to schedule your free trial class. We'll get you set up with everything you need.

pricing.question: Do you offer contracts?
pricing.answer: No, our memberships are month-to-month with no long-term contracts required.

pricing.question: What should I bring to class?
pricing.answer: For your first class, just wear comfortable athletic clothes. We'll provide everything else you need.

general.question: What is Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu?
general.answer: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ) is a martial art focused on grappling and ground fighting. It emphasizes technique and leverage over strength, making it effective for practitioners of all sizes.

general.question: Do I need to be in shape to start?
general.answer: No! You can start training at any fitness level. Our classes are designed to help you progress at your own pace while gradually building strength and endurance.

general.question: Is BJJ safe to practice?
general.answer: Yes, BJJ is very safe when practiced properly. Our instructors emphasize proper technique and safety, and we maintain a controlled training environment.

general.question: How often should I train?
general.answer: As a beginner, we recommend training 2-3 times per week. This allows adequate time for recovery while maintaining consistent progress.
